marginalia.anchor_text: Partes tres Argenti pro Argento: uel Auri pro Auro

position.marginalia_text: 3. Arg 1 a[e]s } arg. 3. Aur 1 arg } Auru[m]

marginalia.translation: Three parts of silver and 1 part of bronze } silver. Three parts of gold and 1 part of silver } gold.
